page.title: 15OUR COMMUNITY CONSTABLE
page.content: In our area we have a community constable called P.C.Allen. If he is working on the 8am to 4pm shift he gets up at 6.30am. When he gets to the police station he checks to see if anything has happened in the night. Then he sets out on his own and walks round his beat. He likes his beat because it has shops and schools and pubs and businesses as well as country side. There is not much violence and he likes the people. He talks to people and tries to find things out. He does not carry a gun but he has used his truncheon if someone is violent. He is not allowed to hit anyone on the head. The worst part of his job is going to accidents and having to tell people that someone has been in an accident. The best part of his job is that every day is different
